snippet: Gov. Rick Snyder will testify before a congressional committee on the water crisis in Flint, he said.
abstract: Michigan Gov Rick Snyder announces he will testify before House Oversight and Government Reform Committee about water crisis in city of Flint.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Rick Snyder will testify before a congressional committee on the water crisis in Flint, he said.

headline.main: Michigan: Snyder Will Testify on Poisoned Water
headline.print_headline: Michigan: Snyder Will Testify on Poisoned Water

keywords.value: House Oversight and Government Reform Committee
